p: Data were organized, edited and analyzed using SPSS version 22 for Windows (IBM Corp., Armonk, NY, USA). The results of the antibacterial activity were expressed as mean Â± standard error of mean. Statistical significance was determined by a one-way analysis of variance followed by the Tukey post hoc test to compare the inhibition zone against the selected bacteria between control and treatment groups. P < 0.05 was considered statistically significant at a 95% confidence interval.
